i recomend this, but dont play it as the first half life game, play the first one first, or else you might have your first gamer fail moment, and you . half life is probly the best first person shooter ever, it was the first one you should play, but first before i go into detail on how its great, i should probly tell you. you should first have a drink because you shouldnt be thirsty when you play this. when i played this game for the first time, i forgot to drink for about 2 hours, which really made me think for the first time about how thirsty you can get. anyways you should get this game, but first make sure you have enough money, First and formost it is a great game.
